title: Trident
content:
Trident Common 1~8 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6) Piercing Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: It is said tridents were brought to the surface when Umberlee threw a Triton prince who scorned her onto Faerun's shores. Trident Thrown Versatile 1.8 40
